DOC.brief_summary: To estimate pharmacokinetics apixaban administer three different modify release formulation tablet relative apixaban administer immediate release tablet
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Comparing Modified Release To Immediate Release Apixaban Tablets In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female patient Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 Any condition possibly affect drug absorption History evidence abnormal bleed clot disorder
DOC.keyword: formulation ; sustain release ; modify release ; extend release
